metadata.Title: CVE-2021-34055 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
jhead 3.06 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow via exif.c in function Put16u.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-34055` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:3.04-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jhead package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.04-1ubuntu0.2').
